Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Deal[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]BROKEN --- Manufactories, Academies, Customs Houses, and Landmarks each provide +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, and +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.[ENDCOLOR]
